value.title: Create a data connection shortcut with PBIDS files - Power BI desktop update October 2019
value.excerpt: The power bi team has released a new Power bi file extension called PBIDS (power bi direct source), that allows you to configure a file with all the connection details of a data source. value.title: Row Level Security in Power BI desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #27
value.excerpt: In this video we will see how to add Row Level security to your Power BI data.  Row Level security is used to restrict data access for given users. Filters restrict data at the row level. You can define filters within roles. What is Row Level Security: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-admin-rls/
